Belgium: Margaret of Constantinople, Countess of Flanders, impounds wares of English merchants in Flanders in retaliation for their king's non-payment of a money fief, sparking a trade war between Flanders and England.
China: Sambyeolcho Rebellion: The Sambyeolcho rebelled against Wonjong of Goryeo, the Mongol-allied king of Goryeo.
Estonia: Lithuanians defeat the Livonian Order in the Battle of Karuse.
France: Louis IX died. He was succeeded by his son Philip III.
